about.title: About
about.subtitle: Let's get to know each other

part1.title: Who we are
part1.content1: LionSkins was made by gamers and for gamers.
part1.content2: The purpose of our service is to provide easy access to trusted marketplaces for you to buy the skins of your dreams for your favorite video games at the best price available.
part1.content3: We are not affiliated to any of the marketplaces we suggest, we just consider them to be trustworthy.
part1.content4: If you have any question, don't hesitate to drop us a message from the <0>contact form</0>!
